CustomField.description: Indicated important fields that are blank and fields on the edge to an higher Level/Scoring
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(urlCareerPage__c),"Career Page"& BR(),"") &
IF(ISBLANK( TEXT(Category_1__c )),"Category 1"& BR(),"") & IF(ISBLANK( TEXT(Category_2__c )),"Category 2"& BR(),"") & IF(ISBLANK( TEXT(Category_3__c )),"Category 3"& BR(),"") &
IF(ISBLANK( TEXT( HeyJobs_Category__c )),"HeyJobs Category"& BR(),"") &
IF(ISBLANK( BillingCity ),"Billing City"& BR(),"") & IF(ISBLANK( BillingCountry ),"Billing Country"& BR(),"") & IF(ISBLANK( BillingStreet ),"Billing Street"& BR(),"") & IF(ISBLANK( BillingPostalCode ),"Billing ZIP"& BR(),"") &
IF(ISBLANK( ShippingCity ),"Shipping City"& BR(),"") & IF(ISBLANK( ShippingCountry ),"Shipping Country"& BR(),"") & IF(ISBLANK( ShippingStreet ),"Shipping Street"& BR(),"") & IF(ISBLANK( ShippingPostalCode ),"Shipping ZIP"& BR(),"") &
IF(ISBLANK( No_of_Locations__c ),"Locations"& BR(),"") & IF(ISPICKVAL( plPlannedHires__c ,"" ),"Planned Hires"& BR(),"")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicated important fields that are blank and fields on the edge to an higher Level/Scoring
CustomField.label: CleanUp Errors
